page.title: 12Our Police 1
page.content: Cairndow is a part of the area that is covered by the mini head quarters at Inveraray.There are two other places that are covered and they are Minard and Furnace.They answer complaints and attend to accidents,firearm certificates and sheepdipping.They do sheep dipping because people say that if the sheep are not dipped properly they might die.Our constable is a district officer and he goes to rural districts like Cairndow or Inveraray.He covers about 38 miles and that stretches from Birdfield to Lochgoilhead and Carrick Castle and 5 miles up the Dalmally road.He doesn't have a beat like a city policeman.He does occurrence work like sudden deaths,road accidents,fires and cars getting broken into.
